The latest auto build of Heritrix, "heritrix-1.7.3-200603211214", is 
considered a first release candidate for Heritrix version 1.8.0. It 
may be obtained from:

http://crawltools.archive.org:8080/cruisecontrol/artifacts/HEAD-heritrix/20060321121351

If you have the chance, please give this latest code a try and let us 
know of any issues you encounter.

Draft release notes are available here:

http://crawler.archive.org/articles/releasenotes.html#1_8_0

1.8.0 is expected to be the last Heritrix version which is officially 
supported on Java JDK 1.4.x ("Java 2"). The next release will require 
Java JDK 1.5.x ("Java 5") features.

Heritrix CVS HEAD is frozen against code commits, except for 
documentation issues and any critical bugs which surface in the next 
week of testing.

- Gordon @ IA
